or something along those lines. Not entirely sure though.

item.title: Slayer Monsters
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

So it would be

                if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 41) {
                    if (playerLevel[18] >= 1) {
                        slayer = true;
                        npcdead = true;
		        addSkillXP(50 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                    } else {
                        slayer = false;
                        sm(
                                "You need a slayer level of 5 to attack chickens.");
                    }
                }

Hmmm… it may help if I say this is dragzscape source.

item.title: Slayer Monsters
item.dc:creator: @xPetrix xPetrix
item.description:
@xPetrix wrote:

Currently with my server, a player receives slayer experience every time they click on the slayer monster.

For instance, this is the code for the chicken

                if (server.npcHandler.npcs[attacknpc].npcType == 41) {
                    if (playerLevel[18] >= 1) {
                        slayer = true;
		        addSkillXP(50 * playerLevel[18], 18);
                    } else {
                        slayer = false;
                        sm(
                                "You need a slayer level of 5 to attack chickens.");
                    }
                }

How would I make it so that they get experience only after they kill the NPC?

Read full topic
